reg_pit.title: Motor Vehicle Act ICBC Records Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 62/2021, effective March 5, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Records prescribed for section 82 (10) of the Act
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of section 82 (10) of the Act, the records described below are prescribed:

change.changenote: Section 2 (e) (ii) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 62/2021, effective March 5, 2021.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: records that pertain to or set out the particulars of the cancellation of registrations, the cancellation or surrender of licences or the surrender of number plates;

change.changenote: Section 2 (e) (iv) was added by BC Reg 62/2021, effective March 5, 2021.
